tasks.task: Presenting AgroFIMS and Agro Ontology for Organizing Agricultural Data
subtasks: Collecting and annotating data using KD Smart (mobile app)
Using Agro Ontology for metadata alignment

tasks.task: Developing and Maintaining the Agro Ontology
subtasks: Reusing existing ontologies (e.g., BFO, CHEBI, OBONEXON)
Creating domain-specific classes (e.g., agricultural experiments, implementing processes)
